original_text: When he takes the throne of his kingdom, he is to write for himself on a scroll a copy of this law, taken from that of the Levitical priests.
korean_text: 그가 왕위에 오르거든 이 율법서의 등사본을 레위 사람 제사장 앞에서 책에 기록하여

sentences.original_text: When he takes the throne of his kingdom
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그의 나라의 왕좌에 오를 때

sentences.original_text: he is to write for himself on a scroll
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자신을 위해 두루마리에 기록해야 한다

sentences.original_text: taken from that of the Levitical priests
